Posts.Content: Hi there just thought a would ask if any one else has had this my arm feels tight and where the vein would have been it now looks like scars x
Posts.Title: pain in the where chemo went in

Posts.Content: Hi jamesy a will tell u a bit about my self am 42 years old have 2 girls one 15 and the wee one is 4 she starts school this year .i had my op in oct last year for invasive ductal cancer grade 3 12 /out 12 lymph nodes where affected . The op went will was only in for 2 day drain removed after one day but when a got home a felt really unwell it took about 2 weeks before they found out i had mrsa so i was back in hospital for 10 days but its just one of these things that can happen.I did not start chemo till dec it did hold things up a bit i have had 6 chemo and now on tamoxifen for 5 years and have 30 rads to get but doing good the only thing that worrys me they can not tell me if there has been spread to the lymth nodes under the coller bone it does not show up on any of the scans they have done so they are going to give me boost rads there it just seems strange that you have to live with not knowing but am just so happy a found it and could get treatment . How are you feeling with the chemo xxxx
Posts.Title: pain in the where chemo went in

Posts.Content: Hi jamesy i had lumpectomy and all lymph nodes removed am just back from the docs about my arm i have tennis albow lol dont know how a got that but least i know what it is now so no house work 4 a couple of weeks who am i kidding if only .I to tend to over do things with my wee one a think a need her more then she needs me some times jamesy you sound very positve and that is what will get you through this and good for you leave nothing to chance .xxxx
Posts.Title: pain in the where chemo went in

Posts.Content: HI jamesy thanks i tryed all off these things had my last of chemo 5 weeks a go and still my arm is sore but have just notice these scars now where my vein used to be i will give voltarol cream a try good luck with the rest of your treatment do you have any rads to follow after chemo x
Posts.Title: pain in the where chemo went in

Posts.Content: That is so true and has made me feel i can do chemo i have been havein second thought why if they have told me the cancer is gone so bring it on .
Posts.Title: a little thought of encouragement

Posts.Content: Had my 4th chemo yesterday and they managed to find a vein in my left arm they put a clay cast on after chemo so my arm if feeling good so far touch hairy wood lol xx
Posts.Title: 4th chemo and it all went well

Posts.Content: Hi flower my names tracy 41 years old live in glasgow i was where u r on oct and worring is like a rocking horse it will get you no where they have to do these test not because they think they will find something its so they will know the best way to treat you .I had breast cancer and spread to the lymth nodes but you have to stay positive and take what treatment they offer things will look better soon is there a maggie centre any where near you the people there are great if there is you should pop in just for a chat a found it very helpfull you take care and good luck x
Posts.Title: Age 37 shock at breast clinic yesterday. totally dazed and reeling...

Posts.Content: well that was good news today and now they should be able to get the ball rolling with your treatment the sooner it starts the sooner it end x
Posts.Title: Age 37 shock at breast clinic yesterday. totally dazed and reeling...

Posts.Content: Hi there i have my 4th chemo to day and my tummy is flipping over prob is my veins and the pain in my arm a feel i could run a mile this has made me ill for the past two weeks just thinking about it the things some of us have to go through xx
Posts.Title: 4th chemo to day

Posts.Content: thanks janice got a phone call 2 day to tell me my blood was low so had 2 go and get more blood taken the nurse could not get any out of my left arm so had 2 use my rite .Thought a was Â geting away with it 2 day but got another fone call 2 tell me my count is back up so am so stressed about where they will give me it .It must b a good feeling that your are coming 2 a end of chemo do you rads after i have 30 to get .xx
Posts.Title: 4th chemo to day

Posts.Content: janice hope scan has went well n hope its good news in thanks for the tips take care xx
Posts.Title: 4th chemo to day

Posts.Content: Hi to all just thought i would share this with yous had my last treatment on tuesday it has been a long life changing road had op 6 fec and 30 rads thought that the end would never come but it does and am so proud of my self so keep your chin up because we are stonger then we think xx
Posts.Title: last of treatment on tuesday
